survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Smart Home Cleaning Robots Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of smart home cleaning robots to assess satisfaction levels, identify pain points, and understand feature preferences.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your smart home cleaning robot?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure readability on mobile devices.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your smart home cleaning robot?

questions.question_text: Which features of your smart home cleaning robot do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to understand popular features. Ensure checkboxes are mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: Which features of your smart home cleaning robot do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using your smart home cleaning robot?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using your smart home cleaning robot?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your smart home cleaning robot to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure recommendation likelihood. Ensure readability on mobile devices.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your smart home cleaning robot to others?

questions.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in future smart home cleaning robots?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather suggestions for future improvements. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in future smart home cleaning robots?
